answerText: Jon Stewart [or Jonathan Leibowitz] [10] This character from South Park kills Scott Tenorman's parents and makes them into chili, freezes himself to obtain a Nintendo Wii but ends up in the atheist future, and invents "Ass Burgers," among other antics.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 10 | 10 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Name the following about Comedy Central's fine programming, [10] This author of America (the Book) includes a "moment of zen" at the end of every episode of the satirical news program that he hosts, The Daily Show.
